page.title: 03WORK-PLACES IN NTH.KILWORTH
page.content: {Ball's.}Station Rd.Renovator of carts ,carriages and horse-drawn caravans(1) {Carryfast}.Station Rd.Nationwide carriers.(approx 40 workers ) {Chandler's.}Station Rd.Makers of wire brushes.(approx 12 workers) {Gandy's Roses.}Station Rd.Garden Centre specialising in roses. Internationally famous for own strains of hybrid roses. (6 in winter,12 Summer) {Reg Morris Transport.}Liquid bulk tanker operators. (8 workers) {Cook's.}Back Lane. Father and son business repairing cars and agricultural machinery. {Goodman's Garage}(4) {Howkin's Garage.}(5) {Sambrook's Garage.}(6)
